mapper.select: SELECT a.ybh,b.rzname,b.rzsex,b.rzcsrq,b.rzhyzk,b.rzzzmm,b.rzxl,c.rsj,b.rzgzjl,a.ygzt FROM yuangongbiao a INNER JOIN rencaizibiao b on a.rzbh=b.rzbh INNER JOIN rencaibiao c on a.rzbh=c.rzbh WHERE b.rzname like "%" #{rzname} "%" and ygzt!='黑名单'

SELECT a.ybh,b.rzname,b.rzsex,b.rzcsrq,b.rzhyzk,b.rzzzmm,b.rzxl,c.rsj,b.rzgzjl,a.ygzt FROM yuangongbiao a INNER JOIN rencaizibiao b on a.rzbh=b.rzbh INNER JOIN rencaibiao c on a.rzbh=c.rzbh WHERE b.rzname like "%" #{rzname} "%" and ygzt='黑名单'
